name: The Supply Closet
description: After your previous department has been outsourced, you find most of your previous coworkers to have been reassigned or let go. You have been given the opportunity to join the purchasing department, a group of people you have previously associated with their annoying habits around the office. Over the next week, your job is to assist the team in a big presentation that they have to give on Friday. If you can successfully do that, you will have secured your position in The department, and potentially made some new friends /a romantic interest.
